edu.harvard.util.graph.algorithm

Class DangalchevClosenessCentrality

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.graph.algorithm.DangalchevClosenessCentrality
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancelable

    public class DangalchevClosenessCentrality
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cancelable
    The algorithm for computing Dangalchev's version of the closeness centrality. More info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Centrality#Closeness_centrality
    Author:
    Peter Macko
